intro_key1: Becoming A Programmer
intro_key2: In this task you will study about 6 new concepts of loops.
intro_key3: Firstly, you have to study about three new concepts from python's website.
intro_key5: Then, you will study the three new concepts from Stackoverflow.
intro_key6: You will write on a google doc about what was your understanding regarding the topic and share it with your mentor and you will also do some questions related to that concept.
intro_key7: You will take a class in which u will explain whatever concept you studied?
